name: The Sole Sentry: Beginnings
description:
The Sole Sentry: Beginnings is a prequel to a game im developing, on another site, but it will release here too. It's made in Game maker,  and you can fire with MOUSE1.

Your goal is to gain 200 Kills, and reach Lvl 10! But is it possible?

There is a bug where your score above 100 will appear to have reset to 100. This is a sprite error,  your score is tracked, but it shows up inncorrectly.

Credits:

Kevin Mac Leod - Musics
